pages.text: Magic Garlic Bread is found in End Cities, and grants $(1)Mana Regen II$() on consumption. If the player is wearing the Duality Rings, they will also receive $(4)Health Boost III$() and $(6)Saturation I$().
Overloaded Candies restore twice the mana that Mana Candies do, but also harm any race with a magic affinity of 250 or less.
